ACLU supporters had a big impact in the Indiana Statehouse! See how we protected civil liberties during the 2019 session!
Read the Wrap Up Report

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

We saw several highs and several lows inside the Indiana Statehouse this year. Again and again, Indiana legislators put their own political agendas ahead of the basic rights and human dignity of everyday Hoosiers.

But ACLU of Indiana supporters such as you turned out to protect civil liberties for all Hoosiers. Community members sent more than 20,000 messages to their legislatures on several bills that raised Constitutional concerns. And although we didnâ€™t win every battle, our voices were heard.

From keeping 12-year old kids out of adult court to protecting the right of trans Hoosiers to change the gender marker on their IDs — we continued to fight and came out with several key victories!

Read more in the full legislative wrap up.

Thanks for sticking with us,

ACLU of Indiana
